languages.text: "Даже здесь ты сияешь, сестра. Не сдалась, не отчаялась... Мне стыдно, что я оказался слаб и не встал с тобой плечом к плечу с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: "Даже здесь ты сияешь, сестра. Не сдалась, не отчаялась... Мне стыдно, что я оказался слаб и не встал с тобой плечом к плечу с самого начала".

languages.text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
languages.original_text: "Даже здесь ты сияешь, сестра. Не сдалась, не отчаялась... Мне стыдно, что я оказался слаб и не встал с тобой плечом к плечу с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
"Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
"Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
"Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
"Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
"Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

languages.text: 「シスター。こんな場所にあっても、お前はなお輝いている。諦めもせず、絶望もしていない…俺は自分の弱さが恥ずかしい。最初から、お前と共に立つべきだった」
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター。こんな場所にあっても、お前はなお輝いている。諦めもせず、絶望もしていない…俺は自分の弱さが恥ずかしい。最初から、お前と共に立つべきだった」

languages.text: "Selbst hier strahlt Ihr noch, Schwester. Ihr habt nicht aufgegeben, seid nicht verzweifelt ... Ich schäme mich für meine Schwäche. Ich hätte Euch von Anfang an beistehen sollen."
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst hier strahlt Ihr noch, Schwester. Ihr habt nicht aufgegeben, seid nicht verzweifelt ... Ich schäme mich für meine Schwäche. Ich hätte Euch von Anfang an beistehen sollen."

languages.text: « Où que vous soyez, vous brillez de mille feux, ma sœur. Vous n'avez pas baissé les bras, vous ne vous êtes pas laissé aller au désespoir... J'ai honte de ma faiblesse. J'aurais dû me tenir à vos côtés dès le départ. »
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: « Où que vous soyez, vous brillez de mille feux, ma sœur. Vous n'avez pas baissé les bras, vous ne vous êtes pas laissé aller au désespoir... J'ai honte de ma faiblesse. J'aurais dû me tenir à vos côtés dès le départ. »

languages.text: «Incluso aquí todavía sigue deslumbrándome, hermana. No se ha rendido, ni ha sucumbido a la desesperación... Me avergüenzo de mi debilidad. Debería haberme mantenido firme a su lado desde el principio».
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso aquí todavía sigue deslumbrándome, hermana. No se ha rendido, ni ha sucumbido a la desesperación... Me avergüenzo de mi debilidad. Debería haberme mantenido firme a su lado desde el principio».

languages.text: “即便是在这里，你依然光彩照人，修女。你没有放弃，没有绝望……我为我自己的软弱感到羞愧，我应该从一开始就与你并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: “即便是在这里，你依然光彩照人，修女。你没有放弃，没有绝望……我为我自己的软弱感到羞愧，我应该从一开始就与你并肩作战。”

languages.text: "Her şeye rağmen parıldıyorsun Rahibe. Pes etmedin, umudunu kesmedin. Zayıflığımdan utanıyorum. En başından yanında olmalıydım."
languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Her şeye rağmen parıldıyorsun Rahibe. Pes etmedin, umudunu kesmedin. Zayıflığımdan utanıyorum. En başından yanında olmalıydım."

languages.original_text: "Even here, you shine still, Sister. You haven't given up, haven't despaired... I am ashamed of my weakness. I should have stood with you from the beginning."
